availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Frank Turner (Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, merchant. Native of Hanover. Married to Mary Turner. Father of Catherine Turner, Barney Turner, Mary Turner, Francis Turner, Anthony Turner. Merchant in Covington in 1860. Employed Mary Turner in Covington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 1, p. 554.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 1, p. 340B.
